column3: Small update: made -checkmempool default in regtest mode.\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/97bf6a7aef976cee0200c11f3915b4d7c0f33c10 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
ACK; logic looks good, compiles and runs on OSX.\n
ACK. I think we should pull this, but I also think pulltester should gain a reproduction of it. @bluematt  where are we keeping issues for the pulltester?\n
